channel.title: How do i set Packages
channel.description:
[i]Ok, my question is How do i set packages, that i can set Staff as reward. Here are my pictures [hr] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/2hf18gy.jpg[/img] [hr] I click on Admin [hr] [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/332ywr5.jpg[/img] [hr] I search for "Packages" [hr] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/28wmeeo.jpg[/img] [hr] And i will see this. I click on Browse Package, so i need to do something with this? [hr] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/23hstbr.jpg[/img] [hr] Now i click on Download Packages, so i need to do something with this? [hr] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/zujvvl.jpg[/img] [hr] Now i click on Installed Packages, so i need to do something with this? [hr] [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/2rw1a1u.jpg[/img] [hr] Now i click on Options, so i need to do something with this? [hr] [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/10cjj4h.jpg[/img] [hr]
[b]If u know how this works, say it here, i will make u Admin on my forum. If u know how to explain on this u can do it too, this is not a Tutorial, but a Request. Move it if is not on the right place, thank you.[/b]
[u][i][b]Thank you for reading.[/b][/i][/u]
[i][b]-Moerin[/b][/i]

item.title: How do i set Packages
item.dc:creator: @moerin moerin
item.description:
@moerin wrote:

[quote=“JV, post:4, topic:181177”][quote author=moerin link=topic=242573.msg2051340#msg2051340 date=1202942055]

Offering admin spots on your forum is frowned upon here at MITB. Have you googled your problem yet?

-JV

Yes, i googled my problem. but i dont find any information about it.
but i dont understand how to add it.
ok my forum is http://jscape.freehostia.com/smf
[/quote]

You’re going to get in a lot of trouble if you don’t delete just ebout every section in that forum. You’ve completely copied moparisthebest forums. You’ve even copied our WDOTM thread.

You’re actually a complete idiot. And anybody who knows me on here’ll tell you that I don’t say things like that very lightly.

Delete yourself from these forums, and delete your forums.

-JV[/quote]
I dint add that, my friend Guthan did it.
I will delete it, and can u help me anyway?

Read full topic
